import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { CloseIcon, AddIcon } from '../../utils/icons'; const ContractDetailsScreen = ({ artist, onClose }) => { const [selectedContract, setSelectedContract] = useState(null); const [showNewContract, setShowNewContract] = useState(false); // Sample contract data const contracts = [ { id: 1, venue: 'Womb Tokyo', event: 'New Year Countdown 2025', date: '2024-12-31', fee: 3500, status: 'signed', duration: '5 hours', requirements: ['CDJ-3000s', '4-channel mixer', 'Sound check 30 min'], terms: { payment: '50% deposit, 50% on completion', cancellation: '72 hours notice required', technical: 'Full Pioneer setup provided', accommodation: 'Hotel provided' } }, { id: 2, venue: 'Fabric London', event: 'Room 1 Headline', date: '2025-01-15', fee: 4200, status: 'pending', duration: '5 hours', requirements: ['CDJ-3000s', 'DJM-A9', 'Monitor speakers'], terms: { payment: '100% after performance', cancellation: '7 days notice required', technical: 'Legendary sound system', accommodation: 'Not included' } }, { id: 3, venue: 'Berghain', event: 'Klubnacht', date: '2025-01-28', fee: 5000, status: 'negotiating', duration: '6 hours', requirements: ['Vinyl + Digital setup', 'Special lighting'], terms: { payment: '50% advance, 50% after', cancellation: '14 days notice required', technical: 'World-class Funktion-One system', accommodation: 'Included' } }, { id: 4, venue: 'Output Brooklyn', event: 'Saturday Residency', date: '2025-02-14', fee: 3800, status: 'draft', duration: '4 hours', requirements: ['CDJ-2000s minimum', 'Green room access'], terms: { payment: 'Net 30 payment terms', cancellation: '48 hours notice', technical: 'Full production support', accommodation: 'Travel expenses covered' } } ]; const getStatusBadge = (status) => { const statusClasses = { 'signed': 'status-badge confirmed', 'pending': 'status-badge pending', 'negotiating': 'status-badge warning', 'draft': 'status-badge neutral' }; return statusClasses[status] || 'status-badge'; }; const formatCurrency = (amount) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD' }).format(amount); }; return (

{artist?.name} - Contracts

{!selectedContract ? ( <> {/* Contract Summary */}

4

Active Contracts

{formatCurrency(16500)}

Total Value

1

Pending Signatures

{/* Contracts List */}

All Contracts

{contracts.map(contract => (
setSelectedContract(contract)} >

{contract.venue}

{contract.status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + contract.status.slice(1)}

{contract.event}

{new Date(contract.date).toLocaleDateString()} {contract.duration} {formatCurrency(contract.fee)}
))}
) : ( /* Contract Detail View */

{selectedContract.venue}

{selectedContract.status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + selectedContract.status.slice(1)}

Event Details

Event: {selectedContract.event}
Date: {new Date(selectedContract.date).toLocaleDateString()}
Duration: {selectedContract.duration}
Fee: {formatCurrency(selectedContract.fee)}

Technical Requirements

    {selectedContract.requirements.map((req, index) => (
  • {req}
    • ))}

Contract Terms

Payment: {selectedContract.terms.payment}
Cancellation: {selectedContract.terms.cancellation}
Technical: {selectedContract.terms.technical}
Accommodation: {selectedContract.terms.accommodation}
{selectedContract.status === 'pending' && ( )} {selectedContract.status === 'draft' && ( )}
)} {/* New Contract Modal */} {showNewContract && (
setShowNewContract(false)}>
e.stopPropagation()}>

Create New Contract

Start a new contract for {artist?.name}

)}
); }; export default ContractDetailsScreen;
